backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing adding a user-provided MP3 asset and listing related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend files in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide detailing how to diagnose deployment issues, asset path problems, and runtime failures with required diagnostics for bug reports.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based stylesheet defining Valentine-themed OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and base styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point with Valentine-themed metadata and Google Fonts loading, mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA component that initializes diagnostics, shows intro overlay, plays background music, and renders themed Valentine content and animations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Generates floating animated heart elements unless reduced‑motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/RosePe: Creates animated falling rose petals with reduced‑motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Rotati: Cycles through romantic one-liners every few seconds with hover‑pause and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Displays a gift button that triggers an animated reveal of a Valentine coupon card with links and themed content.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useInt: Provides audio state, mute toggling, interaction unlocking, and playback for ambient and confirmation sounds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Controls background music playback with mute toggling, user-interaction gating, and lifecycle cleanup.
Renders an intro overlay with evasive 'No' button behavior, audio controls, and an accept handler.
frontend/src/deployDiagnostics.ts: Initializes deployment diagnostics that log environment info and capture runtime, resource, and promise errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full set of custom OKLCH color variables with Valentine-themed styling plus custom components like valentine-card and valentine-badge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/assetBase.ts: Provides a helper that builds correct asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL for SPA deployments.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, animations, and Valentine-specific theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, known issues, and notes related to the Valentine’s site and missing audio asset.
